abstract: An information processing apparatus includes a selector and an extending unit. The selector selects a word in question training data corresponding to a topic. The extending unit extends the question training data by replacing the word selected by the selector in the question training data by a word in answer data corresponding to the topic.
summary: <SOH> SUMMARY <EOH>According to an aspect of the invention, there is provided an information processing apparatus including a selector and an extending unit. The selector selects a word in question training data corresponding to a topic. The extending unit extends the question training data by replacing the word selected by the selector in the question training data by a word in answer data corresponding to the topic.
title: INFORMATION PROCESSING APPARATUS AND METHOD AND NON-TRANSITORY COMPUTER READABLE MEDIUM
